name: Pixel Bombs
description: Classic reaction timekiller. You need to deactivate the bombs that want to explode, hold out as much as possible and do not blow...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
